title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: goal generatervis synthesise clinical data, create workflow , visualise data. crucial understand data used repository, including FASTQ files clinical data, either artificially generated modified testing educational purposes . represent real patient biological data.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(generatervis) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
